mdRecord.dcterms:title: Petersburg, Jan'y 10th, 1854: Dear Sir: Below we hand you our views of the Tobacco Trade the present year, with a few suggestions regarding prizing, tendering you our services as Grocers and Commission Merchants / Britton, Todd & Harrison
Dear Sir: Below we hand you our views of the Tobacco Trade the present year
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Britton, Todd & Harrison.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Form letter, with text on the first page of one folded sheet.
Folded for mailing and addressed on p. [4] to J.W. Cunningham, Esq., Cuninghams Store, N.C.; with one cent U.S. postage stamp.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Folded sheet, unbound. Robert and Virginia Tunstall Trust Fund, 2015/2016.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Tobacco industry--Virginia.
Tobacco farmers--Virginia.
Tobacco farmers--North Carolina.
Commission merchants--Virginia--Petersburg.
